BR_text.BRsummary: featran does not normalize feature names
BR_text.BRdescription:
This can be a problem when using scio's <denchmark-link:https://github.com/spotify/scio/blob/master/scio-tensorflow/src/main/scala/com/spotify/scio/tensorflow/TFRecordSpec.scala>TFRecordSpec</denchmark-link>
 , where TF doesn't like things like space in the feature name.

comments_0.comment_text: Discussed IRL. Since this is TensorFlow specific, I think it make sense to have normalization built into FeatureBuilder[Example]?

comments_2.comment_text: still failing in 0.1.27: ValueError: 'track.gracenote_era_0_Early 20th C.' is not a valid scope name

comments_3.comment_text: actually it might be a red herring - double checking.

comments_4.comment_text: Actually it's fine - it's a bug in scio.
